title: T206 odd, unusual, rare for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206 odd, unusual, rare for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
Scans of all cards available.  Prices include delivery and insurance.

Hayden, Indianapolis.  Very large top border, one of the tallest T206 cards I have ever seen.  $75.

Unglaub, Washington.  Orange background, instead of the usual red. Very clean card.  $125.

Steinfeldt, portrait, Cubs.  Red background, instead of the usual orange.  Looks very nice alongside portraits of Tinker and Chance.  Beautiful card.  $125.

Jennings, dancing for joy.  This card has the Piemont 460 factory 42 NC back.  Looks near mint, measures perfectly.  I broke this card out of a Beckett holder, where it was graded 5.5 EX, sent it to PSA, and it was returned labeled evidence of trimming.  How stupid am I?  $250.
